validations.title: Not enough example phrases provided
validations.description: Required: Provide at least 1 example phrase

validations.title: Too many Example Phrases provided
validations.description: Please limit your entry to a maximum of 3 example phrases.

validations.title: Example Phrase has duplicate phrases
validations.description: Your example phrases must not be duplicates. Please provide unique entries.

validations.title: Example Phrase too short
validations.description: Your example phrase does not meet the minimum character limit of 2 characters.

validations.title: Example Phrase exceeds maximum length
validations.description: Your example phrase has exceeded the maximum character limit of 200 characters.

validations.title: Example Phrase contains special characters
validations.description: Example phrases can only contain apostrophes, quotation marks, question marks, periods, exclamation points, and commas.

validations.title: Example Phrase cannot be blank
validations.description: The example phrase may not be left empty. At least one example phrase must exist.

validations.title: Example Phrase must start with Wake Word
validations.description: The example phrase must start with a valid wake word. (i.e. Alexa).

validations.title: Example Phrase must contain invocation name
validations.description: Your example phrase must contain the invocation name: [reindeer skill].

validations.title: Example Phrase must contain invocation name
validations.description: Your example phrase must contain the invocation name: [reindeer skill].

validations.title: Example Phrase too short
validations.description: Your example phrase does not meet the minimum character limit of 2 characters.

validations.title: Example Phrase exceeds maximum length
validations.description: Your example phrase has exceeded the maximum character limit of 200 characters.

validations.title: Example Phrase contains special characters
validations.description: Your example phrase must not contain special characters. However, '[@, !, #, $, %, &, (, ), *, /, :, {, [, ;, |, \, <, }, ], ^, >, _]' was found.
